-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Add-ons to Yi, the Haskell-Scriptable Editor
--   
@package yi-contrib
@version 0.10.1


-- | This file aims to provide (the essential subset of) the same
--   functionality that vim plugins ctrlp and command-t provide.
--   
--   Setup:
--   
--   Add something like this to your config:
--   
--   (ctrlCh <tt>p</tt> ?&gt;&gt;! fuzzyOpen)
--   
--   Usage:
--   
--   <a>C-p</a> (or whatever mapping user chooses) starts fuzzy open
--   dialog.
--   
--   Typing something filters filelist.
--   
--   <a>Enter</a> opens currently selected file in current (the one that
--   fuzzyOpen was initited from) window.
--   
--   <a>C-t</a> opens currently selected file in a new tab. <a>C-s</a>
--   opens currently selected file in a split.
--   
--   <a>KUp</a> and <a>C-p</a> moves selection up <a>KDown</a> and
--   <a>C-n</a> moves selection down
--   
--   Readline shortcuts <a>C-a</a> , <a>C-e</a>, <a>C-u</a> and <a>C-k</a>
--   work as usual.
module Yi.FuzzyOpen
fuzzyOpen :: YiM ()


-- | Templates for inserting into documents
module Yi.Templates
templates :: TemplateLookup
templateNames :: [TemplateName]
lookupTemplate :: TemplateName -> Maybe Template
addTemplate :: String -> EditorM ()


-- | A couple of themes.
module Yi.Style.Misc

-- | Theme originally designed by Joseph Andrew Magnani for TextMate, and
--   redistributed with explicit permission. It is not usable in the vty
--   UI.
happyDeluxe :: Theme

-- | Theme originally developed by Matthew Ratzloff for TextMate, and
--   redistributed with explicit permission. It is not usable in the vty
--   UI.
textExMachina :: Theme


module Yi.Config.Users.Reiner

-- | Registers my settings in the <a>ConfigM</a> monad.
setup :: ConfigM ()

-- | The main entry point, when used as a standalone yi.hs file.
main :: IO ()


module Yi.Config.Users.Michal
myConfig :: Config
defaultSearchKeymap :: Keymap
myKeymapSet :: KeymapSet
myBindings :: (EventString -> EditorM ()) -> [VimBinding]

-- | I declare "proper black" in GTK, since Vty terminal seems to have
--   grayish black in 16-color system. Fortunately default _background_
--   color is available through Default :: Yi.Style.Color. Note that this
--   works only in background! (Default foreground color is green.)
defaultColor :: Color
myTheme :: Proto UIStyle
prefIndent :: Mode syntax -> Mode syntax
myModes :: [AnyMode]
currentDate :: IO String
makeUnderline :: String -> String
currentDateAndUnderline :: IO String
insertCurrentDate :: YiM ()
diaryMode :: AnyMode


module Yi.Config.Users.JP
config :: Config

module Yi.Config.Users.Gwern
config :: Config


module Yi.Config.Users.Anders
config :: Config
main :: IO ()


module Yi.Config.Users.Amy
myConfig :: Config
defaultUIConfig :: UIConfig
extendedCuaKeymapSet :: KeymapSet
helloWorld :: YiM ()
